form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Petition to Classify Status of Alien Relative for Issuance of Immigrant Visa

full_text: Screened by NARA UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service Form approved OMB No. 43-RO401 Date filed Fee stamp PETITION TO CLASSIFY STATUS OF ALIEN RELATIVE FOR ISSUANCE OF IMMIGRANT VISA TO THE SECRETARY OF STATE: The petition was filed on OCT 17-1975 Remarks The petition is approved for status under section: SPOUSE, 201 (b) CHILD 203 (a) (2) DATE approuced OF ACTION J.Suriell 201 (b) PARENT 203 (a) (4) DD 203 (a) (1) 203 (a) (5) DISTRICT .OS 1330 DEC 07 1975 (PETITIONER IS NOT TO WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE) 2013 1. Petition is hereby made to classify the status of the alien beneficiary for issuance of an immigrant visa as: (Check one) The spouse, child (regardless of age), parent, brother, or sister of a United States citizen. The spouse or unmarried child (regardless of age) of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence. Block 1. Information About Alien Beneficiary 2. Name (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 3. Do Not Write in This Space 4. Relationship of beneficiary to petitioner LATH AYODHABAI GOVINDRAM MOTHER A21-526239 6. Are beneficiary and petitioner related by adoption? 5. Other names used; (including maiden name if married woman) No LADHE BHAGA GOPALDAS L-300 9. Beneficiary's marital status: 7. Place of birth (Country) 8. Date of birth (Month, day, year) Varadsim, India 7-18-1907 Married Widowed Divorced Single 12. Has this beneficiary ever been in the U.S.? 10. Petitioner's name (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 11. Petitioner's phone MANE Kamille Lathi 209/784.5007 Yes No 13. Name of beneficiary's spouse, if married, and date and country of birth (Omit this item if petition is for your spouse) Lathi Govindram Totaram 12-22-1903 India. Names, birthdates and countries of birth of beneficiary's children, if any Amarnath G. Lathi 6.7.1936 India Subhashchandra G. Lathi 10-26-38 India FOIA (b)(6) 15. Full address of beneficiary's spouse and children, if any (Omit this item if petition is for your spouse) Amarnath G. Lathi - 461 steeple chase Lane Bridgewater, N.J. 08876 Subhashehandra G.Lathi - 34 No anett Rd, Needham. Mass 02912 FOIA (b)(6) 16. give a. Date and place of your present marriage b. Number of your prior marriages c. Number of prior marriages of spouse Not- applicable d. Last address at which you and your spouse resided together From To (Town or city) (State or Province) (Country) (Apt. No.) (Number and street) (Month) (Month) (Year) 17. If this petition is for a child, (a). Is the child married? (b). Is the child your adopted child? If so, give the names, dates, and places of birth of all other children adopted by you. If none, so state. Not applicable 18 If this petition is for a brother or sister, are both your parents the same as the alien's parents? If not, submit separate statement giving full details as to parentage, dates of marriage of parents, and the number of previous marriages of each parent. Not applicable 19. If separate petitions are also being submitted for other relatives, give names of each and relationship to petitioner. Lathi Govindram Totaram Father 20. Have you ever filed a petition for this alien before? No If so, give place and date of filing and result. FORM 1-130 RECEIVED TRANS IN RET'D-TRANS. COMPLETED (REV. 2-1-741
